SELECT DISTINCT a.p_no ,b.m_no , ( CASE WHEN a.p_no IN ( SELECT c.p_no FROM com_reco a ,co_med b ,patient c ,doctor d WHERE a.co_no = b.co_no AND b.p_no = c.p_no AND d.d_id = b.co_doc ) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END )as c_reco ,a.p_name ,a.p_sex ,substr(a.p_rnum,1,6) AS p_rnum ,b.d_name ,b.symptom ,TO_CHAR(b.m_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS m_date
FROM patient a ,medi_reco b ,doctor c
WHERE b.d_id = c.d_id AND b.p_no = a.p_no
AND b.d_id = #{d_id} ORDER BY m_date DESC

SELECT DISTINCT count(*)
FROM patient a ,medi_reco b ,doctor c
WHERE b.d_id = c.d_id AND b.p_no = a.p_no
AND b.d_id =#{dId} ORDER BY m_date DESC

SELECT a.p_name ,a.p_sex ,substr(a.p_rnum,1,6) as p_rnum ,b.co_disease ,c.sub_d_name ,b.co_doc ,b.end_reason ,e.d_name ,d.ma_name ,TO_CHAR(b.co_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS co_start_date ,TO_CHAR(b.end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS end_date FROM patient a ,co_med b ,co_sub_d c ,major d ,doctor e ,com_reco F WHERE a.p_no = b.p_no AND e.d_id = b.co_doc AND d.ma_no = e.ma_no AND b.co_no = F.co_no AND b.co_no = c.co_no(+) AND e.d_id = #{d_id} ORDER BY co_start_date DESC

SELECT a.m_no ,d.p_name ,d.p_sex ,substr(d.p_rnum,1,8) as p_rnum ,a.d_name ,b.sub_d_name ,c.d_name ,a.symptom ,TO_CHAR(a.m_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS m_date FROM medi_reco a ,sub_d b ,doctor c ,patient d WHERE c.d_id = a.d_id AND a.p_no = d.p_no AND a.m_no = b.m_no AND a.m_no =#{m_no}

SELECT a.p_name ,a.p_sex ,a.p_rnum ,b.co_disease ,c.sub_d_name ,b.co_doc ,e.d_name ,d.ma_name ,TO_CHAR(b.co_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS co_start_date FROM patient a ,co_med b ,co_sub_d c ,major d ,doctor e WHERE a.p_no = b.p_no AND e.d_id = b.co_doc AND d.ma_no = e.ma_no AND b.co_no = c.co_no AND b.com_no = #{com_no}

SELECT DISTINCT ( a.noti_no ) AS noti_no ,a.resd_id ,a.reqd_id ,b.d_id ,b.d_name ,c.ma_name ,a.read ,TO_CHAR(a.noti_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS noti_date FROM noti a ,doctor b ,major c ,co_med d WHERE c.ma_no = b.ma_no AND b.d_id = a.reqd_id AND d.co_doc = a.reqd_id AND a.co_no = d.co_no AND a.resd_id = #{dId}

SELECT a.noti_no ,a.resd_id ,a.reqd_id ,a.response ,a.read ,TO_CHAR(a.noti_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS noti_date ,b.d_name ,c.ma_name FROM noti a ,doctor b ,major c WHERE c.ma_no = b.ma_no AND a.reqd_id = b.d_id AND a.resd_id = #{dId} order by noti_date desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.dis_no ,a.d_name ,b.dis_title ,TO_CHAR(c.r_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS r_date FROM doctor a ,case_dis b ,dis_recom c WHERE a.d_id = c.d_id AND b.dis_no = c.dis_no AND b.del_yn ='N' AND a.d_id = #{d_id} UNION SELECT d.dis_rply_no ,a.d_name ,b.dis_title ,TO_CHAR(d.r_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS d_date FROM doctor a ,case_dis b ,dis_reply c ,reply_recom d WHERE d.d_id = a.d_id AND c.dis_rply_no = d.dis_rply_no AND c.dis_no = b.dis_no AND a.d_id = #{d_id}
) ORDER BY r_date DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.dis_no ,a.d_name ,b.dis_title ,TO_CHAR(c.r_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS r_date FROM doctor a ,case_dis b ,dis_recom c WHERE a.d_id = c.d_id AND b.dis_no = c.dis_no AND b.del_yn = 'N' AND a.d_id = #{d_id} UNION SELECT d.dis_rply_no ,a.d_name ,b.dis_title ,TO_CHAR(d.r_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS d_date FROM doctor a ,case_dis b ,dis_reply c ,reply_recom d WHERE d.d_id = a.d_id AND c.dis_rply_no = d.dis_rply_no AND c.dis_no = b.dis_no AND c.del_yn = 'N' AND a.d_id = #{d_id} UNION SELECT a.o_no ,b.d_name ,a.o_title ,TO_CHAR(c.r_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS r_date FROM drug_orderset a ,doctor b ,drug_recom c WHERE a.o_no = c.o_no AND b.d_id = c.d_id AND b.d_id = #{d_id} AND a.del_yn = 'N' ) ORDER BY r_date DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (a.dis_rply_no) as log_num ,a.dis_no as codeNum ,c.dis_title ,a.dis_content ,TO_CHAR(a.dis_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS log_date
FROM dis_reply a ,doctor b ,case_dis c WHERE a.d_id = b.d_id AND c.dis_no = a.dis_no AND b.d_id = #{d_id} AND a.del_yn ='N' UNION SELECT (a.fb_no) as log_num ,a.o_no as codeNum ,b.o_title ,a.fb_result ,TO_CHAR(a.fb_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS log_date
FROM order_feed a ,drug_orderset b ,doctor c WHERE a.doc_id = c.d_id AND b.del_yn='N' AND a.o_no = b.o_no AND c.d_id = #{d_id} ) ORDER BY log_date DESC

SELECT a.n_no ,a.n_title ,a.admin_id ,TO_CHAR(a.n_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS n_date ,b.notice_yn ,c.d_id FROM notice a ,noti_confirm b ,doctor c WHERE a.n_no = b.n_no AND b.d_id = c.d_id AND b.d_id = #{d_id} ORDER BY n_date DESC
SELECT n_no ,n_title ,n_content ,admin_id ,TO_CHAR(n_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS n_date ,pop_yn FROM notice WHERE n_no = #{n_no}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (a.dis_rply_no) as log_num ,c.dis_title ,a.dis_content ,TO_CHAR(a.dis_date,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') AS log_date
FROM dis_reply a ,doctor b ,case_dis c WHERE a.d_id = b.d_id AND c.dis_no = a.dis_no AND b.d_id = #{dId} UNION SELECT (a.fb_no) as log_num ,b.o_title ,a.fb_result ,TO_CHAR(a.fb_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') AS log_date
FROM order_feed a ,drug_orderset b ,doctor c WHERE a.doc_id = c.d_id AND a.o_no = b.o_no AND c.d_id = #{dId} ) ORDER BY log_date DESC

SELECT a.p_name ,a.p_sex ,a.p_rnum ,b.co_disease ,c.sub_d_name ,b.co_doc ,b.end_reason ,e.d_name ,d.ma_name ,TO_CHAR(b.co_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS co_start_date ,TO_CHAR(b.end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS end_date FROM patient a ,co_med b ,co_sub_d c ,major d ,doctor e ,com_reco F WHERE a.p_no = b.p_no AND e.d_id = b.co_doc AND d.ma_no = e.ma_no AND b.co_no = F.co_no AND b.co_no = c.co_no(+) AND e.d_id =#{dId}

SELECT DISTINCT c.d_id ,a.p_no ,b.m_no ,d.sub_d_name , ( CASE WHEN a.p_no IN ( SELECT c.p_no FROM com_reco a ,co_med b ,patient c ,doctor d WHERE a.co_no = b.co_no AND b.p_no = c.p_no AND d.d_id = b.co_doc ) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END )as c_reco ,a.p_name ,a.p_sex ,substr(a.p_rnum,1,6) AS p_rnum ,b.d_name ,TO_CHAR(b.m_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS m_date
FROM patient a ,medi_reco b ,doctor c ,sub_d d
